product_name: New Balance Minimus 1010 Road-Running Shoes - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The New Balance Minimus 1010 Road-Running Shoes are designed for runners looking to enter the wonderful world of minimalist footwear, but with caution and a bit more underfoot cushioning. Built around the Minimus last with 4mm heel-to-toe drop that encourages a natural midfoot or forefoot strike to promote forward momentum and reduce the impact of heel striking. Shoes have a total stack height of 16mm at the heels and 12mm at the toes for comfortable cushioning on long runs. Lightweight, abrasion-resistant nylon mesh uppers let feet breathe and offer sturdy performance in demanding conditions; synthetic overlays help provide structure and support. Synthetic linings wick perspiration away from your feet and dry quickly to discourage the development of blisters. Lightweight and thin foam midsoles offer flexibility and featherweight cushioning. Aggressive Vibram rubber outsoles on the New Balance 1010 Minimus Road-Running Shoes give you the traction needed for taking on the streets. Closeout.
short_description: The New Balance Minimus 1010 Road-Running Shoes are designed for runners looking to enter the wonderful world of minimalist footwear, but with caution and a bit more underfoot cushioning.
